vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jos.7.1;
son of: Zerah (H2226I);
brother of: Ethan (H0387H), Heman (H1968H), Calcol (H3633H) and Dara (H1873);
father of: Carmi (H3756H); also called Zimri at 1Ch.2.6;
Also named: zim.ri (זִמְרִי "Zimri" H2174I)
§ Zabdi = "endowment"
1) son of Zerah and grandson of Judah; grandfather of Achan
2) one of the sons of Shimhi, a Benjamite
3) an officer of David, in charge of the produce of the vineyards for the wine-cellars
4) son of Asaph the minstrel; also called 'Zaccur' and 'Zichri'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) זִמְרִי   hijo de Zérah; tribu de Judá; (b)   hijo de Simí; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (c)   funcionario; en tiempos de David; (d) ֶזִכְרִי ,זַכּוּר   hijo de Asaf; ancestro de Matanías, levita
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒底 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "賦予"
1) 猶大支派亞干的祖父 (書7:1)
2) 一名便雅憫人 (代上8:19)
3) 大衛王的文官,掌管葡萄園的出產 (代上27:27)
4) 一名利未人 (尼11:17)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
撒底 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "赋予"
1) 犹大支派亚干的祖父 (书7:1)
2) 一名便雅悯人 (代上8:19)
3) 大卫王的文官,掌管葡萄园的出产 (代上27:27)
4) 一名利未人 (尼11:17)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.19;
son of: Shimei (H8096N);
brother of: Jakim (H3356), Zichri (H2147H), Elienai (H0462), Zillethai (H6769), Eliel (H0447H), Adaiah (H5718H), Beraiah (H1256) and Shimrath (H8119)
§ Zabdi = "endowment"
1) son of Zerah and grandson of Judah; grandfather of Achan
2) one of the sons of Shimhi, a Benjamite
3) an officer of David, in charge of the produce of the vineyards for the wine-cellars
4) son of Asaph the minstrel; also called 'Zaccur' and 'Zichri'

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.27
§ Zabdi = "endowment"
1) son of Zerah and grandson of Judah; grandfather of Achan
2) one of the sons of Shimhi, a Benjamite
3) an officer of David, in charge of the produce of the vineyards for the wine-cellars
4) son of Asaph the minstrel; also called 'Zaccur' and 'Zichri'

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.15;
son of: Asaph (H0623I);
father of: Mica (H4316); also called Zabdi at Neh.11.17;
Another name of zikh.ri (זִכְרִי "Zichri" H2147K)
§ Zabdi = "endowment"
1) son of Zerah and grandson of Judah; grandfather of Achan
2) one of the sons of Shimhi, a Benjamite
3) an officer of David, in charge of the produce of the vineyards for the wine-cellars
4) son of Asaph the minstrel; also called 'Zaccur' and 'Zichri'
